column3:
Maru is looking longingly at the sky.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the green astamudgara to Maru.
Got a moment to spare? I've been wantin' some flowers to lay down as an offerin' to Sanduruva...
Only a certain kind'll do, though─dark green astamudgara. They only grow at Night's Watch, to the east of Yedlihmad.
They'll fall to bits if you don't pick 'em right, but I reckon you've got a delicate touch. More so than any of <Emphasis>us</Emphasis> clumsy oafs, that's for certain...
Anyhow, a pair of our Riders'll be standin' by in case you need assistance gettin' up or down. Flower pickin' ain't their forte, but I've never seen such hippo-cart derrin'-do...
Yeah, these are the ones! An' in great condition, too.
Of all eight colors of astamudgara, they say Sanduruva likes this dark green the best.
When you're prayin' for good business, it's these flowers or nothin'. We've gotta make sure we're pullin' out all the stops, after all...
